mapper.select: select to_number(u.stan_date) as stan_date, nvl(u.user_n,0) as user_n, nvl(p.plan,0) as plan, nvl(t.tour_board,0) as tour_board, nvl(c.com_board,0) as com_board from (select to_char(signup_date, 'YYMMDD') as stan_date, count(*) as user_n from member where to_char(signup_date, 'YYMMDD') >= '220203' and to_char(signup_date, 'YYMMDD') <= to_char(sysdate, 'YYMMDD') group by to_char(signup_date, 'YYMMDD')) u full outer join(select to_char(writen_date, 'YYMMDD') as stan_date, count(*) as plan from plan where to_char(writen_date, 'YYMMDD') >= '220203' and to_char(writen_date, 'YYMMDD') <= to_char(sysdate, 'YYMMDD') group by to_char(writen_date, 'YYMMDD')) p on(u.stan_date = p.stan_date) full outer join (select to_char(writen_date, 'YYMMDD') as stan_date, count(*) as tour_board from tour_board where to_char(writen_date, 'YYMMDD') >= '220203' and to_char(writen_date, 'YYMMDD') <= to_char(sysdate, 'YYMMDD') group by to_char(writen_date, 'YYMMDD')) t on(u.stan_date = t.stan_date) full outer join (select to_char(writen_date, 'YYMMDD') as stan_date, count(*) as com_board from company_board where to_char(writen_date, 'YYMMDD') >= '220203' and to_char(writen_date, 'YYMMDD') <= to_char(sysdate, 'YYMMDD') group by to_char(writen_date, 'YYMMDD')) c on(u.stan_date = c.stan_date) order by stan_date
